attachments.title: Will.i.am's Puls Smartwatch: So Bad I'm Actually Kind of Impressed
attachments.text: "Call <http://Will.i.am|Will.i.am>," you yell at your wrist cuff as you leave your trendy apartment. "Play Get This Party Started," you shriek into your other wrist cuff as you step out of a black car. A thin, tinny melody leaks out of the shackleâ€”just as your ankle cuff buzzes. It's a text from Fergie. She's already at the club! You pop and lock as you tap a response into one of 17 other cuffs strapped to your body.
attachments.fallback: Gizmodo: Will.i.am's Puls Smartwatch: So Bad I'm Actually Kind of Impressed

text: hah! "It's designed by a lunatic surrounded by yes-men."
